General.Name: Allspring Multi Sector Income Fund
General.Description: Allspring Multi-Sector Income Fund is a closed-ended fixed income mutual fund launched and managed by Wells Fargo Funds Management, LLC. The fund is co-managed by First International Advisors, Inc. and Wells Capital Management Incorporated. It invests in fixed income markets across the globe. The fund primarily invests in a mix of non-investment-grade corporate debt securities, including bank loan securities, foreign and emerging markets debt securities, adjustable and fixed-rate mortgages, and investment-grade corporate bonds. Allspring Multi-Sector Income Fund was formed on June 25, 2003 and is domiciled in the United States.
General.Address: 1415 Vantage Park Drive, Charlotte, NC, United States, 28203
